seg.translation: Audi: "Dieselgate" regeneration takes longer than planned
Audi: "Dieselgate" refurbishment taking longer than planned
Audi: "Dieselgate" refurbishment takes longer than planned

seg.source: "Die Diesel-Taskforce gibt es immer noch", sagte Entwicklungsvorstand Peter Mertens dem Branchenblatt "Automobilwoche".
seg.translation: There is still a diesel taskforce, said Peter Mertens, chief development officer from the ‘Automobilwoche’ trade journal.
"The diesel task force is still at work", said Chief Development Officer Peter Mertens to industry publication "Automobilwoche".
"The diesel task force still exists," Chief Development Officer Peter Mertens told the industry publication "Automobilwoche."

seg.source: Der inhaftierte und beurlaubte Audi-Chef Rupert Stadler hatte im Dezember 2017 angekündigt, die Taskforce werde bald aufgelöst.
seg.translation: In December 2017 the imprisoned and suspended Audi CEO Rupert Stadler had announced, the taskforce will be dissolved soon.
Audi chief Rupert Stadler, who has been detained and is currently suspended, had announced in December 2017 that the task force would soon be dissolved.
Audi CEO Rupert Stadler, who was arrested and placed on leave, announced in December 2017 that the task force would soon be disbanded.

seg.source: "Im ersten Quartal 2018 sind voraussichtlich alle Motor/Getriebe-Kombinationen geprüft", hatte er damals gesagt.
seg.translation: In the first quarter of 2018 all engine/transmission combinations will have been checked, he said at the time.
"We expect all engine/gear combinations to have been checked by the first quarter of 2018", he said at the time.
"All engine / transmission combinations are expected to be tested in the first quarter of 2018," he said at the time.

seg.source: Mertens sagte nun: "Anfang Juli haben wir ein wichtiges Etappenziel in der Aufarbeitung der Dieselkrise erreicht.
seg.translation: Mertens now says: ‘At the start of July we have an important milestone by which the diesel crisis will have been worked out.
Mertens now says: "At the start of July, we reached an important landmark in dealing with the diesel crisis.
Mertens said: "At the beginning of July, we reached an important milestone in dealing with the diesel crisis.

seg.source: Wir haben die internen technischen Analysen unserer VTDI-Motoren abgeschlossen.
seg.translation: We have completed the internal technical analyses of our VTDI engines.
We have completed the internal technical analyses of our VTDI engines.
We have completed the internal technical analyses of our VTDI engines.

seg.source: Die Taskforce war im September 2015 nach der Entdeckung des Dieselskandals bei der Audi-Mutter Volkswagen gegründet worden.
seg.translation: The taskforce was set up in September 2015 following the discovery at Audi parent company Volkswagen.
The task force was set up in September 2015 after the outbreak of the diesel scandal at Audi's parent company, Volkswagen.
The task force was set up in September 2015 following the discovery of the diesel scandal at Audi's parent company Volkswagen.

seg.source: Mertens betonte, der Autobauer habe "gravierende organisatorische Änderungen" vorgenommen, damit ein solcher Skandal nie wieder vorkomme.
seg.translation: Mertens highlighted that the automobile manufacturers had made ‘serious, organizational changes’, to prevent such a scandal ever happening again.
Mertens stressed that the car manufacturer had made "drastic organizational changes" to prevent another such scandal from occurring.
Mertens stressed that the carmaker had made "serious organisational changes" to ensure such a scandal would never happen again.

seg.source: Der VW-Aufsichtsrat hatte am Freitag eine Entscheidung über Stadlers Zukunft vertagt und will an diesem Dienstag weiter diskutieren.
seg.translation: The VW Supervisory Board had postponed a decision on Stadler's future on Friday and will continue this discussion on Tuesday.
The VW supervisory board deferred a decision on Stadler's future on Friday and will hold further discussions on Tuesday.
The VW supervisory board postponed a decision on Stadler's future on Friday and plans to discuss it further on Tuesday.

seg.source: Die Ermittlungsbehörden werfen dem Audi-Chef vor, nach Bekanntwerden der Abgasbetrügereien den Verkauf von Dieselautos mit falschen Abgaswerten zugelassen zu haben.
seg.translation: The investigating authorities accuse the Audi boss, following awareness of exhaust emission cheating, of permitting the sale of diesel automobiles with false emission values.
The investigatory authority accuses the Audi chief of having approved the sale of diesel vehicles with falsified emissions ratings after becoming aware of emissions fraud.
The investigating authorities accuse the Audi boss of having allowed the sale of diesel cars with incorrect exhaust emission values after becoming aware of the emissions cheating.

seg.source: Dabei habe er von den Manipulationen gewusst oder sie bewusst ignoriert.
seg.translation: He must have known about the tampering or deliberately ignored it.
They accuse him of having known of, or ignored, the manipulation.
In doing so, he allegedly knew about the manipulations or deliberately ignored them.

seg.source: Derzeit leitet Vertriebsvorstand Bram Schot das Unternehmen als kommissarischer Vorstandschef.
seg.translation: Currently the Sales Director Bram Schot heads the company as Acting Chief Executive Officer.
Sales director Bram Schot is currently managing the company as interim chief executive.
Currently, Chief Sales Officer Bram Schot heads the company as acting CEO.

seg.source: Wegen der Umstellung auf den neuen Abgas- und Verbrauchsprüfstandard WLTP gebe es Produktionsausfälle bei Audi, sagte Schot der "Heilbronner Stimme".
seg.translation: After conversion to the new emissions and consumption standard WLTP, there were production losses at Audi, Schot told the ‘Heilbronner Stimme’.
Schot told the "Heilbronner Stimme" that the conversion to the new WLTP exhaust and consumption testing standard would result in production losses at Audi.
Due to the changeover to the new exhaust and fuel consumption test standard WLTP, there are production losses at Audi, Schot told the "Heilbronner Stimme."

seg.source: Grundsätzlich sehe er eine sinkende Nachfrage nach Limousinen wie den Audimodellen A6, A7 und A8, die in Neckarsulm produziert werden.
seg.translation: Essentially, he sees a falling demand for limousines such as the Audi models A6, A7 and A8, produced in Neckarsulm.
He sees a falling demand for limousine models, such as Audi models A6, A7 and A8, which are produced in Neckarsulm.
In principle, he sees a decreasing demand for saloons such as the A6, A7 and A8 audio models, which are produced in Neckarsulm.

seg.source: "Das Segment an sich ist schwierig", sagte er.
seg.translation: The segment in itself is a difficult one, he said.
"The sector is a difficult one in its own right", he said.
"The segment itself is difficult," he said.
Schot is for electromobility.
Schot is focusing on electromobility.
Schot focuses on electric mobility.

seg.source: Für den e-tron, das erste Audi-Elektroauto, lägen bereits 15.000 Reservierungen vor.
seg.translation: There are already 15,000 reservations for the e-tron, the first Audi electric automobile.
15,000 reservations have already been made for the e-tron, Audi's first electric vehicle.
There have already been 15,000 reservations for the e-tron, the first Audi electric car.
